General.Name: Chinese Universe Publishing And Media Co Ltd
General.Description: Chinese Universe Publishing and Media Group Co., Ltd. engages in the editing, printing, publishing, and distribution of books, newspapers, periodicals, electronic publications, and audio and visual materials in China and internationally. It also offers domestic and foreign trade and supply chain services, logistics and Internet of Things technology applications, and other industrial chain extension services; and media and online education services. In addition, it engages in online gaming and digital publishing; film and television production; artwork management; insurance brokerage; operating cultural complexes; and investment and financing businesses. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Nanchang, China. Chinese Universe Publishing and Media Co.,Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Jiangxi Publishing Group Co., Ltd.
